name: Fantasy Fishing 2
description:
Very early build of a fishing game.

Inspired by Stardew Valley

Movement = WASD

Fishing Mini Game = W and D to move green floater to the left and right. Floater will drift toward the closest horizontal edge.

Upgrade the rod to make the fishing easier.

Features to come:

  1. Character customisation - 90% complete, just no ui for the player to do it themselves
  2. House decorating - Buy and decorate a house with certain items purchased with your fishing cash
  3. Different zones - More fishing zones to catch different kinds of fish
  4. Fishing compendium - Track and catalogue the different kinds of fish you've caught
